column3: Latest;Tbong Khmum:------ 35 pistols were seized on the road leading to Vietnam border on 28 th. October 2018 at 11:20 am in Memot district.------According to a confession from the truck owner
column4: they were transporting goods from Olympic Market in Phnom Penh to Vietnam
column5: but didn’t know what the contents were.------Under the orders of the Royal Gendarmerie Commander-in-Chief and coordinated by Hieng Sopheak
column8: the drivers and the illegal weapons were handed to the Tbong Khmum Military Police Command to act accordingly.------TVFB------
